text: Ra yadi paigambarale timila'i talaka di'ihalun bhane yasa kurako dherai sambhavana cha ki unako palanakartale timro sattama unala'i timibhanda ramri patniharu pradana garnecha jo muslima imanavali, ajnakarini, tauba garne, ibadata (stuti) garnevali, vrata basnevali, vidhava ra kumariharu pani hunechin
